Elements.Body: So Effy’s at like noon? I’ve been thinking a lot, and making a list of all the things I wanna go over when you’re here. We don’t have to cover everything, but I’ve got a few things I think we should definitely talk about.
Anything that I can answer right now?

Well, there are a couple things that don’t need waiting: did you suspect that Megan was taken by Nightmares when I told you? What makes people like you and Lawrence so different from all those other people? Why did Amaia just give the update to you, Lawrence and Kat?

Well, there are a couple things that don’t need waiting: did you suspect that Megan was taken by Nightmares when I told you? What makes people like you and Lawrence so different from all those other people? Why did Amaia just give the update to you, Lawrence and Kat?
Short answers are no, nothing, and I don’t know.
What exactly do you mean by 'people like' me and Lawrence?

Lately if you search up the word nightmare or really anything to do with with sleep, you get a ton of stories like the one you told me last week. There are people out there who saw and experienced what you had, but why didn’t they disappear? Why haven’t you noticed them?

Lately if you search up the word nightmare or really anything to do with with sleep, you get a ton of stories like the one you told me last week. There are people out there who saw and experienced what you had, but why didn’t they disappear? Why haven’t you noticed them?
We were scared too shitless to figure that out ourselves.
Honestly, that’s a question I don’t know how to answer.
